com.miviclin.droidengine2d.input

Class KeyEventInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.input.KeyEventInfo

  • public class KeyEventInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    KeyEventInfo holds information about a KeyEvent.
    KeyEvents are inmutable, so DroidEngine2D uses KeyEventInfo to create mutable copies of KeyEvents so they can be pooled and reused. KeyEventInfo objects are not mutable from app code.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyEventInfo(android.view.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Creates a new KeyEventInfo with the information about the specified KeyEvent.

    • Method Detail

      • obtain

        public static KeyEventInfo obtain(android.view.KeyEvent keyEvent)
        Creates a new KeyEventInfo, copying from an existing KeyEvent.
        The KeyEventInfo is obtained from a pool. If the pool is empty, a new KeyEventInfo will be created.
        When the returned KeyEventInfo is not needed anymore, recycle() should be called.
        Parameters:
        keyEvent - KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        KeyEventInfo.

      • recycle

        public void recycle()
        Recycles the KeyEventInfo, to be re-used by a later caller. After calling this function you must not ever touch the event again.
